event.description: Willy Taveras flies out to left fielder Jeremy Hermida.
Jerry Hairston walks.
With Joey Votto batting, Jerry Hairston steals (1) 2nd base.
Joey Votto singles on a line drive to left fielder Jeremy Hermida. Jerry Hairston scores.
Brandon Phillips flies out to center fielder Alfredo Amezaga. Joey Votto advances to 2nd, on a throwing error by second baseman Dan Uggla.
Jay Bruce strikes out swinging.
Adam Rosales grounds out, third baseman Emilio Bonifacio to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Chris Dickerson called out on strikes.
Ramon Hernandez singles on a ground ball to center fielder Alfredo Amezaga.
Edinson Volquez singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Cody Ross. Ramon Hernandez to 2nd.
Willy Taveras grounds into a force out, shortstop Hanley Ramirez to second baseman Dan Uggla. Edinson Volquez out at 2nd.
Jerry Hairston grounds out, third baseman Emilio Bonifacio to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Joey Votto walks.
With Brandon Phillips batting, Joey Votto steals (2) 2nd base, . Joey Votto advances to 3rd, on a throwing error by catcher John Baker.
Brandon Phillips singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jeremy Hermida. Joey Votto scores.
With Jay Bruce batting, Brandon Phillips caught stealing 2nd base, catcher John Baker to shortstop Hanley Ramirez.
Jay Bruce called out on strikes.
Adam Rosales strikes out on a foul tip.
Chris Dickerson strikes out swinging.
Ramon Hernandez grounds out, second baseman Dan Uggla to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Edinson Volquez grounds out, second baseman Dan Uggla to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Willy Taveras singles on a line drive to left fielder Jeremy Hermida.
Jerry Hairston singles on a bunt ground ball to third baseman Emilio Bonifacio. Willy Taveras to 2nd.
Joey Votto walks. Willy Taveras to 3rd. Jerry Hairston to 2nd.
Brandon Phillips singles on a line drive to center fielder Alfredo Amezaga. Willy Taveras scores. Jerry Hairston scores. Joey Votto to 3rd.
Jay Bruce grounds into a double play, second baseman Dan Uggla to shortstop Hanley Ramirez to first baseman Jorge Cantu. Brandon Phillips out at 2nd.
Adam Rosales grounds out, third baseman Emilio Bonifacio to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Chris Dickerson flies out to center fielder Alfredo Amezaga.
Ramon Hernandez flies out to left fielder Jeremy Hermida.
Pitching Change: Hayden Penn replaces Chris Volstad, batting 9th, replacing Brett Carroll.
Edinson Volquez strikes out swinging.
Willy Taveras flies out to center fielder Alfredo Amezaga.
Jerry Hairston doubles (2) on a line drive to right fielder Cody Ross.
Hayden Penn intentionally walks Joey Votto.
Brandon Phillips homers (4) on a fly ball to left field. Jerry Hairston scores. Joey Votto scores.
Jay Bruce singles on a ground ball to right fielder Cody Ross.
Adam Rosales grounds out, third baseman Emilio Bonifacio to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Chris Dickerson singles on a ground ball to center fielder Alfredo Amezaga.
Ramon Hernandez singles on a ground ball to left fielder Jeremy Hermida. Chris Dickerson to 2nd.
Edinson Volquez out on a sacrifice bunt, pitcher Hayden Penn to first baseman Jorge Cantu. Chris Dickerson to 3rd. Ramon Hernandez to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Darnell McDonald replaces Willy Taveras.
Darnell McDonald grounds out, shortstop Hanley Ramirez to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Jerry Hairston strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Kiko Calero replaces Hayden Penn, batting 9th, replacing Ross Gload.
Joey Votto singles on a line drive to center fielder Alfredo Amezaga.
Brandon Phillips strikes out swinging.
Laynce Nix doubles (5) on a line drive to right fielder Cody Ross. Joey Votto to 3rd.
Adam Rosales grounds out to first baseman Jorge Cantu.
Chris Dickerson flies out to left fielder Jeremy Hermida.
Emilio Bonifacio strikes out swinging.
John Baker called out on strikes.
Hanley Ramirez flies out to center fielder Willy Taveras.
Jorge Cantu flies out to center fielder Willy Taveras.
Dan Uggla lines out to left fielder Chris Dickerson.
Jeremy Hermida strikes out swinging.
Cody Ross hit by pitch.
Alfredo Amezaga pops out to third baseman Adam Rosales in foul territory.
With Chris Volstad batting, Ramon Hernandez picks off Cody Ross at 1st on throw to Brandon Phillips.
Chris Volstad lines out to second baseman Brandon Phillips.
Emilio Bonifacio grounds out, catcher Ramon Hernandez to first baseman Joey Votto.
John Baker walks.

Hanley Ramirez doubles (9) on a line drive to center fielder Willy Taveras. John Baker out at home on the throw, center fielder Willy Taveras to shortstop Jerry Hairston to catcher Ramon Hernandez. Hanley Ramirez to 3rd on the throw.
Jorge Cantu pops out to catcher Ramon Hernandez in foul territory.
Dan Uggla pops out to second baseman Brandon Phillips.
Jeremy Hermida doubles (3) on a pop up to left fielder Chris Dickerson, deflected by shortstop Jerry Hairston.
Cody Ross flies out to center fielder Willy Taveras.
Alfredo Amezaga flies out to center fielder Willy Taveras.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Brett Carroll replaces Chris Volstad.
Brett Carroll pops out to shortstop Jerry Hairston.
Emilio Bonifacio walks.
With John Baker batting, wild pitch by Edinson Volquez, Emilio Bonifacio to 2nd.
John Baker strikes out swinging.
Hanley Ramirez strikes out on a foul tip.
Jorge Cantu walks.
Dan Uggla walks. Jorge Cantu to 2nd.
Jeremy Hermida called out on strikes.
Cody Ross called out on strikes.
Alfredo Amezaga grounds out, second baseman Brandon Phillips to first baseman Joey Votto.
Darnell McDonald remains in the game as the center fielder.
Defensive Substitution: Laynce Nix replaces right fielder Jay Bruce, batting 5th, playing right field.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ross Gload replaces Hayden Penn.
Ross Gload singles on a line drive to right fielder Laynce Nix.
Emilio Bonifacio flies out to right fielder Laynce Nix.
John Baker grounds into a double play, second baseman Brandon Phillips to shortstop Jerry Hairston to first baseman Joey Votto. Ross Gload out at 2nd.
Pitching Change: Nick Masset replaces Edinson Volquez, batting 9th.
Hanley Ramirez strikes out swinging.
Jorge Cantu grounds out, shortstop Jerry Hairston to first baseman Joey Votto.
Dan Uggla strikes out swinging.
